title: Malignant Melanoma Diagnosis and Patient Management Competency Enhancement Program

context.additional_context: Smartphone-based learning environment, providing case-based learning and feedback centered on practical tasks.

learning_goals: Identification of clinical features of suspected malignant melanoma patients with 80% accuracy
Determination of appropriate referral timing in 90% of skin cancer patient evaluations
Achievement of over 75% accuracy in case-based decision-making during formative assessments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
